analyzed: śikṣāsamuccaya kārikā

original: yadā mama pareṣāṃ ca bhayaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca na priyam /
analyzed: yadā mama pareṣām ca bhayam duḥkham ca na priyam

original: tadātmanaḥ ko viśeṣo yattaṃ rakṣāmi netaram // Śsk_1 //
analyzed: tadā ātmanaḥ kaḥ viśeṣaḥ yat tam rakṣāmi na itaram
duḥkha antam kartu kāmena sukha antam gantum icchatā

original: śraddhāmūlaṃ dṛḍhīkṛtya bodhau kāryā matirdṛḍhā // Śsk_2 //
analyzed: śraddhā mūlam dṛḍhīkṛtya bodhau kāryā matiḥ dṛḍhā
śikṣā ādaraḥ mahāyānāt bodhisattvasya saṃvaraḥ
marma sthānāni atas vidyāt yena anāpattikaḥ bhavet
ātma bhāvasya bhogānām tri adhva vṛtteḥ śubhasya ca
utsargaḥ sarva sattvebhyaḥ tad rakṣā śuddhi vardhanam
paribhogāya sattvānām ātma bhāva ādi dīyate

original: arakṣite kuto bhogaḥ ki dattaṃ yanna bhujyate // Śsk_5 //
analyzed: arakṣite kutas bhogaḥ ki dattam yat na bhujyate
tasmāt sattva upabhoga artham ātma bhāva ādi pālayet
kalyāṇa mitra an utsargāt sūtrāṇām ca sadā īkṣaṇāt
tatra ātma bhāve kā rakṣā yat anartha vivarjanam
kena etat labhyate sarvam niṣphala spanda varjanāt
etat sidhyet sadā smṛtyā smṛtiḥ tīvra ādarāt bhavet
ādaraḥ śama māhātmyam jñātvā ātāpena jāyate
samāhitaḥ yathābhūtam prajānāti iti avadat muniḥ

original: śamācca na caleccitaṃ bāhyaceṣṭā nivartanāt // Śsk_9 //
analyzed: śamāt ca na calet citam bāhya ceṣṭāḥ nivartanāt
sarvatra apacalaḥ manda mati snigdha abhibhāṣaṇāt
āvavarjayet janam bhavyam ādeyaḥ ca api jāyate

original: anādeyaṃ tu taṃ lokaḥ paribhūya jināṅkuram /
analyzed: anādeyam tu tam lokaḥ paribhūya jina aṅkuram

original: bhasmacchanno yathā vahniḥ pacyeta narakādiṣu // Śsk_11 //
analyzed: bhasma channaḥ yathā vahniḥ pacyeta naraka ādiṣu
ratnameghe jinena uktaḥ tena saṅkṣepa saṃvaraḥ
yena aprasādaḥ sattvānām tat yatnena vivarjayet
eṣā rakṣā ātma bhāvasya bhaiṣajya vasāna ādibhiḥ
ātma tṛṣṇā upabhogāt tu kliṣṭa āpattiḥ prajāyate
sukṛṭa ārambhiṇā bhāvyam mātra jñena ca sarvatas

original: iti śikṣāpadādasya bhogarakṣā na duṣkarā // Śsk_14 //
analyzed: iti śikṣā padāt asya bhoga rakṣā na duṣkarā
sva artha vipāka vaitṛṣṇyāt śubham saṃrakṣitam bhavet

original: paścātāpaṃ na kurvīta na ca kṛtvā prakāśayet // Śsk_15 //
analyzed: paścātāpam na kurvīta na ca kṛtvā prakāśayet
lābha satkāra bhītaḥ syāt unnatim varjayet sadā
bodhisattvaḥ prasannaḥ syāt dharme vimatim utsṛjet
śodhitasya ātma bhāvasya bhogaḥ pathyaḥ bhaviṣyati
samyak siddhasya bhaktasya niṣkaṇasya iva dehinām

original: tṛṇacchanna yathā śasyaṃ rogaiḥ sīdati naidhate /
analyzed: tṛṇacchad na yathā śasyam rogaiḥ sīdati na edhate

original: buddhāṅkurastathā vṛddhiṃ kleśacchanno na gacchati // Śsk_18 //
analyzed: buddha aṅkuraḥ tathā vṛddhim kleśa channaḥ na gacchati
ātma bhāvasya kā śuddhiḥ pāpa kleśa viśodhanam
sambuddha utta yartha sāreṇa yatna bhāve tu apāya gaḥ
kṣameta śrutam eṣeta saṃśrayeta vanam tatas
sāma ādhānāya yujyeta bhāvayet aśubha ādikam
bhoga śuddhim ca jānīyāt samyak ājīva śodhanāt
śūnyatā karuṇā garbhe ceṣṭitāt puṇya śodhanam

original: grahītāraḥ subahavaḥ svalpaṃ ceda manena kim /
analyzed: grahītāraḥ su bahavaḥ su alpam kim
na ca ati tṛpti janakam vardhanīyam idam tatas
ātma bhāvasya kā vṛddhiḥ bala an ālasya vardhanam
śūnyatā karuṇā garbhāt dānāt bhogasya vardhanam
kṛtvā ādau eva yatnena vyavasāya āśayau dṛḍhau

original: karuṇāṃ ca puraskṛtya yateta śubhavṛddhaye // Śsk_24 //
analyzed: karuṇām ca puraskṛtya yateta śubha vṛddhaye
śraddhā ādīnām sadā abhyāsaḥ maitrī buddha ādi anusmṛtiḥ
sarva avasthāsu sattva arthaḥ dharma dānam nirāmiṣam

original: bodhicittaṃ ca puṇyasya vṛddhihetuḥ samāsataḥ // Śsk_26 //
analyzed: bodhi cittam ca puṇyasya vṛddhi hetuḥ samāsatas
siddhiḥ samyak prahāṇānām apramāda aviyojanāt
smṛtyā atha samprajanyena yoniśas cintanena ca
